decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans 1527(BD03)-DW-4600-001-PL, 1527(BD03)-DW-4600-002-PL, 1527(BD03)-DW-4600-003-PL, 1527(BD03)-DW-4600-004-PL and 1527(BD03)-DW-4600-005-PL submitted 13th January 2012  therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The rating level of noise emitted from fixed plant on the site, shall be lower than the existing background noise level by 10dB. The noise levels shall be determined at the nearest noise sensitive locations. The levels shall be determined according to BS4142:1997
description: Installation of one kitchen fresh air supply louvre, one extract louvre and a cross pollution barrier
